Articles.Content:
Hey ho, i search for an tool for other speed units.

Anyone an idea?

It's been some time, but i'm sure i saw a plugin which offered several speed units(km/h, miles, mach), if it's just for having the km/h readout, you shouldn't need a mod for it (1h=3600sec -> 1m/s = 3,6 km/h)
And 1m/s is close enough to 6000 furlongs per fortnight.

Afaik FAR has some options to change the unit for the speed display. But that mod might add to much other stuff for you liking.

I don't know of any other mod which could do that.
[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75308](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75308) is most likely still working for 1.0.4
